citeinfo.origin: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.
citeinfo.title: Mexico Municipalities, 2008

serinfo.issue: 2008 World, Europe, United States, Canada, and Mexico

descript.abstract:
Mexico Municipalities is a polygon theme representing the municipios of Mexico with coastlines, international boundaries, state boundaries, and municipio boundaries. Attribute information includes the area, state and name of the municipio.
This dataset is a part of the 2008 ESRI Data & Maps collection.
descript.purpose: Mexico Municipalities provides the municipalities of Mexico with detail appropriate for national, regional, and local levels.
descript.supplinf: Largest scale when displaying the data: 1:400,000.

cntinfo.cntinst:

For support, you may contact ESRI Support Center by telephone (voice) between 6:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. Pacific time, Monday through Friday, by dialing 888-377-4575; facsimile (fax) available at 909-792-0960; electronic mail (e-mail) support@esri.com; or visit http://support.esri.com/; ESRI holidays excluded.
Outside the United States Please direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing, sales, support, and consulting services to your local ESRI International Distributor. This information can be found at http://gis.esri.com/intldist/contact/.
For other questions or comments, you may contact ESRI headquarters by e-mail, telephone, or fax or write to us.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.2.1350

dataqual.logic: The shapefile is converted to SDC (Smart Data Compression) format using either ESRI SDC Data Development Kit Professional 2 (DDKP2) or tools in ArcGIS. The SDC data set is then loaded into ArcSDE to verify and validate the geometry.
dataqual.complete: After processing, the data set is checked for drawing display and number of records and file sizes compared with source materials.

horizpa.horizpar: The positional accuracy is not known.

citeinfo.origin: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.
citeinfo.title: Proyecto Mxico Informacin Cartogrfica Digital

pubinfo.publish: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.

citeinfo.origin: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.
citeinfo.title: Mexico Municipalities, 2008
citeinfo.othercit: Provides the sources for: 1) the added islands in the Pacific Ocean and off of the Yucatan Peninsula, 2) the repositioned islands of Ensenada, and 3) the attributes ST_ID, MUN_ID, COLORMAP, and SQKM.

procstep.procdesc: The following steps were performed by ESRI: Downloaded the data from the Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V. FTP site. Added islands in the Pacific Ocean and off of the Yucatan Peninsula from the 2004 Mexico Municipalities. Added the repositioned islands of Ensenada from the 2004 Mexico Municipalities. Renamed attribute names in Spanish to English. Made the attribute values title case that were uppercase. Made the features multi-part based on the MUN_NAME, ST_NAME, and ST_MUN_ID attributes. Added attributes ST_ID, MUN_ID, SQKM, and COLORMAP from the Mexico Municipalities with an ArcGIS relate on ST_MUN_ID. Converted the data set to SDC. Created ArcGIS layer file (.lyr), projection file (.prj), and spatial indices.

enttyp.enttypd: The polygons represent the municipio (county) political units for Mexico.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdefs: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.

attr.attrdef: The state name in which the municipality is located.
attr.attrdefs: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.

attr.attrdef: The combined state and municipality codes as a numeric code. Use this code to uniquely identify a municipality.
attr.attrdefs: Sistemas de Informacin Geogrfica, S.A. de C.V.

attr.attrdef: The character code for the state in which the municipality is located.
The character code for the municipality.
The area of the municipality in square kilometers.
The number allows the municipality to be colored so municipalities of the same color don't touch.
